name: PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Smart Automatic Litter Box - Uncovered Motion-Sensing Cat Box with Integrated Health Counter & App - Includes 1 Disposable Crystal Litter Tray
short_description: Self-Cleaning Top-Entry Litter Box: Experience the convenience of an automatic self-cleaning litter box with the ScoopFree Crystal Smart Automatic Litter Box; motion sensors and crystal litter offer easy cleanup
Odor Free & Hygienic: Crystal litter absorbs liquid and dehydrates solid waste, while leak-proof disposable trays and low-tracking crystals make cleanup easy so your home stays clean and fresh
Track Your Cat's Health: An integrated health counter monitors your cat's litter box usage, allowing you to note any irregularities that may signal possible health concerns
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
Over 25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: The PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box offers a hands-free, odor-free solution for maintaining a clean and healthy environment for your indoor cat. This electric, motion-sensing cat box uses advanced self-cleaning technology to automatically rake waste into a covered compartment once your cat leaves, eliminating the need for daily scooping. This top-entry box uses non-clumping crystal litter that absorbs liquid, dehydrates solid waste, and neutralizes odors up to five times more effectively than traditional clumping litter. With low-tracking, 99% dust-free crystals and leak-proof plastic liners, this system keeps your floors stain-free and your home fresh. Tray replacement is simple: just slide out the used tray and dispose of it with the included lid for quick, hygienic cleanups with minimal effort. An integrated health counter tracks your cat’s litter box usage, helping you monitor their well-being and detect potential issues early, while the crystal litter is gentle on their paws. Whether you're a busy pet parent or simply looking for a more efficient way to manage your cat’s litter, the PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro delivers a streamlined, easy-to-use experience that keeps your cat comfortable and your home odor free. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.

name: Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box Scoop Free Cat Litter Tray with Microban, Made in USA
short_description: EASY CLEANING: Simplify your cat care routine with the sifting cat litter box's patented lift-to-sift technology. This provides efficient litter maintenance without scooping.
MAXIMUM ODOR CONTROL: As one of the best litter boxes for indoor cats, its built-in Microban protection inhibits odors from kitty litter.
MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS: This sifting litter box for pine pellets is Made in the USA with recycled materials.
VERSATILE LITTER COMPATIBILITY: Our cat litter tray can utilize pine, crystal, pellets, and clumping cat litter. We suggest using Arm & Hammer SLIDE for optimal results with this cat litterbox.
COMFORTABLE SPACE FOR CATS: By following the guideline of being 1.5 times longer than your cat, and with its large cat litter box design, this product accommodates your feline friend's comfort needs.
product_description: Designed as a large litter box, it features advanced sifting technology that eliminates the need for a litter scoop. Simply lift the sifting box to separate clumps, keeping the cat litter box large and clean. The built-in Microban protection actively inhibits unpleasant odors. This jumbo litter box is made with recycled materials. It highlights Arm & Hammer's dedication to eco-friendly and sustainable pet supplies for cats. It accommodates various types of litter, including pellets for cat litter box, pine, crystal, and clumping varieties, with Arm & Hammer Slide being the preferred choice. Our high sided litter box is particularly suited for large cats, providing spacious comfort. As part of the Arm & Hammer range that includes pet supplies for cats like cat litter mats, cat litter & housebreaking, litter box with lid, cat boxes for indoor cats, kitty litter box, sifting litter boxes and more, this cat litter box offers a comprehensive suite of pet supplies for cats, including solutions for cat litter & housebreaking needs. With its easy clean litter box design, this xl cat litter box provides convenience and hygiene, making it a reliable choice for cat litter boxes for indoor cats. Invest in the Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box for a hassle-free experience, meeting all your kitty litter box needs.

name: Litter-Robot 4 Supply Bundle by Whisker, Black - Automatic, Self-Cleaning Cat Litter Box, Includes Litter-Robot 4, 3 OdorTrap Refills, 10 Liners, 30 Cleaner Wipes, & 2 Carbon Filters
short_description: LITTER-ROBOT SUPPLY BUNDLE: Save on the Litter-Robot 4 Supply Bundle, which comes complete with Litter-Robot 4 automatic litter box, 3 OdorTrap refills, 10 waste drawer liners, 30 cleaner wipes, & 3 carbon filters.

SELF-CLEANING LITTER BOX: Never scoop again with Litter-Robot 4, the automatic, self-cleaning cat litter box. The patented sifting process automatically separates your cat's waste from the clean litter. Just empty the waste drawer when full.

MONITOR + CONTROL VIA APP: Control the smart litter box straight from the Whisker app. Monitor waste and litter levels in real time, see litter box activity, and track kitty’s weight after each use. Compatible with any clumping litter.
REDUCES LITTER BOX ODORS & TRACKING: The automatic clean cycle and OdorTrap Packs significantly reduce odors compared to standard litter boxes.

SAFETY & USE: Suitable for up to 4 cats; each cat must weigh at least 3 lbs (1.4 kg) to safely use Litter-Robot in Automatic Mode. Weight scale technology is most accurate when the unit sits on a firm surface, not carpeting or uneven surfaces.

DESIGNED & ASSEMBLED IN THE USA: Litter-Robot comes with our comprehensive WhiskerCare 1-Year Warranty with an extended plan available for purchase. Whisker products may be returned with no cost but shipping.

name: Pet-Pourri Smell Ya Litter Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray, Purrfectly Bamboo 3.4 Fl Oz, Up to 170 Uses, Pet Odor Remover with Essential Oils for Air, Carpet, Urine, Vet Recommended, Bergamot Bamboo Scent
short_description: Instant Freshness, No Lingering Odors: A few sprays of Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo odor neutralizer spray instantly deodorize cat odors, especially strong urine and litter box smells, so your home stays fresh and inviting

Multi-Purpose and Whole Home Friendly: Safe for use in the air, litter box, and on fabrics, to freshen up furniture, rugs, carpet, curtains, and any place kitty funks linger. Infused with Pourri's Funk Lock Technology to lock in odors

Cat-Friendly Formula: Unlike standard air fresheners, this deodorizing spray can be used directly in the litter box to maintain freshness between pees, poops and scoops. Free from harsh ingredients for a gentle experience for your fluffy feline friend

Naturally Long-Lasting Fragrance: Infused with Bergamot, Jasmine and Bamboo, this formula leaves behind a calming, fresh aroma that helps make litter box duty a little less doody. Simply spritz 3–5 times in a clean litter box for a sweet, inviting scent

Fresh and Clean Formula: Pet Pourri spray is made with natural plant-based ingredients and essential oils. Leaping Bunny Certified, never tested on animals and formulated without dyes, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, because your pet's health matters

One Brand, All the Funk: The Pourri Promise means plant-based, stink-stopping sprays that actually work. Whether it’s your trash can, shoes, diaper pail, fabric, or your furry friend’s corner—there’s a Pourri for that - just spray and go
product_description: Poo-Pourri Smell Ya Purrfectly Bamboo Litter Deodorizer Spray Love your cat, not their litter box smell? That’s where Pourri Purrfectly Bamboo Cat Litter Deodorizer Spray comes in. With just a few spritzes, our Proprietary Funk Lock Technology neutralizes tough odors—especially strong urine and litter box smells—so your home stays fresh and inviting. Infused with a relaxing blend of Bergamot, Jasmine, Bamboo and Pear, it refreshes the air and fabrics while keeping your litter box smelling clean between scoops. Suitable for whole-home freshness, Purrfectly Bamboo works in the air, on furniture, rugs, curtains, and any place kitty funk lingers. Made with natural, plant-based ingredients and essential oils, this litter box spray is never tested on animals and contains no dyes, sulfates, parabens, or phthalates, gentle enough to spray directly in the litter box. Simply spritz 3-5 times inside the clean litter box, fill with litter, and enjoy a fresh, clean scent as it freshens the odor.  From the makers of Poo~Pourri, Pet-Pourri lives up to the Pourri Promise—plant-based, stink-stopping solutions that work anywhere odors lurk. Whether it’s shoes, trash cans, diaper pails, fabrics, or your furry friend’s favorite spot, there’s a Pourri for that.

product_description: Experience the next level of feline care with our Smart Automatic Litter Box. Operating at an ultra-quiet level of under 35 dB, it keeps your home calm and stress-free. The advanced cleaning system takes the hassle out of daily maintenance, while built-in 2.4GHz Wi-Fi and Bluetooth ensure effortless app control. Through the app, you can monitor your cat’s well-being in real time and access detailed insights—such as weight, visit length, and usage frequency—tracked over the past week. Enhanced with reliable anti-pinch protection, it provides safe, worry-free performance. Ideal for households with multiple cats, this innovative litter box is designed to transform pet care with ease and convenience.

name: Self-Cleaning Cat Litter Box with Large Capacity and Automatic Cleaning, Smart Litter Box with App Control, Triple Safety Protection, 1 Rolls Garbage Bags
short_description: 【Hassle-Free Choice for Multi-Cat Households】This automatic litter box features a spacious 76L rotating drum and a 13L sealed waste compartment, fully meeting the waste storage needs of multi-cat households. It significantly reduces the hassle of frequent cleaning, making daily maintenance more efficient and worry-free.

【Triple Protection Mechanism, Safeguarding Your Beloved Pet's Well-being】The auto cat litter box integrates radar detection, infrared sensors, and a precision weighing system to automatically pause operation when your cat approaches. Its triple anti-pinch design comprehensively protects kittens, adult cats, and multi-cat households, ensuring your pet's peace of mind during bathroom breaks.

【Smart App Remote Control for Effortless Pet Care】The self-cleaning litter box connects to a smart app via 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, enabling remote operation: track your cat's usage frequency in real time, receive timely cleaning reminders and overflow alerts, and customize personalized cleaning schedules—all designed to meet modern pet owners' expectations for convenient care.

【Easy-Clean Materials for Lasting Freshness at Home】Crafted from durable PP, ABS, and POM materials, the smart litter box features impact-resistant properties and a smooth, wipeable surface. Its sealed waste compartment effectively traps odors, keeping your home consistently fresh and pleasant.

【Silent and Energy-Efficient, Disturbance-Free Day and Night】The smart automatic litter box features a super-quiet design paired with energy-saving technology, ensuring nighttime cleaning won't disturb your rest. Its low-power consumption makes it ideal for quiet spaces like bedrooms and apartments, balancing practicality with comfort to maintain a harmonious living rhythm for both you and your pet.
